I have appointed Elmer López Rodríguez as the new minister to represent the MAGA portfolio, which served as secretary of the SAG.
Ekaterina Parrilla will be in charge of the Secretariat of Economic Planning. Previously, she served as Deputy Minister of Energy and Mines.
Fernando Carrera will assume as new Chancellor. The officials named above will assume their positions shortly.
